author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Opening Movie for Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined, a remake of the classic RPG developed by Square Enix and HexaDrive Inc. Players can witness the epic and remade opening movie to a timeless tale and an adventure that crosses seas and time itself. Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined is launching on February 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) with a demo launching on January 7 with carry-over progress on all platforms.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined - Official Opening Movie

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
James Cameron's Avatar: Fire and Ash has crossed $1 billion at the global box office, making it the third movie in the franchise to reach that mark. So far, Cameron's is three for three for this Avatar films, but it's unlikely it will reach $2 billion like the first two movies did, and this could mean Disney may be hesitant to greenlight Avatars 4 and 5. In other movies news, Netflix reportedly wants a 17-day window for theatrically-released movies, far shorter than the standard 45-day window. With Netflix attempting to buy Warner Bros., this could put the streamer at odds with filmmakers already working in the WB system on movies like the DC Universe and Godzilla. And in related news, Leonardo DiCaprio has voiced in opinion on the theatrical experience, wondering if it'll turn into something for 'niche' audiences.

#IGN
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash Makes $1 Billion, But That May Not Be Enough - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

author: IGN
description: Get a look at the Launch Trailer for Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue, a fire rescue pixel-based platformer developed by Ravenlore Studio. Players will embody the role of a firefighter to serve the public across different worlds, biomes, and more with a narrative centered on confronting inner demons after traumatic events. Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue is available now for PC (Steam).
title: Fire Hero: Pixel Rescue - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
I’ve covered quite a few fighting game mods here on IGN, but this might be one of the most impressive. Thanks to modder Kongmeng, the protagonist of Yu-Gi-Oh, Yami Yugi, has been added to the Dragon Ball Fighterz roster. But this isn’t just a palette swap. He has brand new mechanics that might make him one of the most complicated characters to learn. Let’s go over how to install him, and how he works.

Timecodes:
00:00 - Intro
00:26 - How to Install
02:09 - Character Overview
07:09 - Intro

Mod Page by Kongmeng:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/641650

Kongmeng’s X (Twitter) Account:
https://x.com/Kongmeng_J

Unverum Download:
https://gamebanana.com/tools/7162#FileInfo_1367926

In-Depth Card Mechanics From Kongmeng:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lmL0iYH8ySg

DRAGON BALL FighterZ - Yami Yugi Character Mod Trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TaqmUXzipyg

#IGN #Gaming
title: DBFZ Yu-Gi-Oh Mod - How to Play as Yami Yugi In Dragon Ball FighterZ

author: IGN
description: Check out the Reveal Trailer for Critterville Goes Bankrupt, a town life simulation RPG developed by Penniless Games. Players will ensure a safe and relaxing sanctuary for the town of Critterville. Claim the royal title to manage the village, tend to farms, and more in Critterville Goes Bankrupt, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Critterville Goes Bankrupt - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for They Will Kill You, an upcoming comedic horror film distributed by Warner Bros. A housekeeper gets thrown in the middle of a sinister plot in a New York City building in They Will Kill You, in theaters on March 27.

A woman takes a job as a housekeeper in a NYC high-rise, unaware of the building's history of disappearances. She soon realizes the community is shrouded in mystery, causing her to survive the night at the Virgil, a demonic cult’s mysterious and twisted death-trap of a lair, before becoming their next offering.

They Will Kill You stars Zazie Beetz, Myha’La, Paterson Joseph, Tom Felton, Heather Graham, Patricia Arquette, and more. The film is directed by Kirill Sokolov alongside being written by Alex Litvak and Kirill Sokolov.

They Will Kill You is in theaters on March 27.
title: They Will Kill You - Official Trailer (2026) Zazie Beetz, Patricia Arquette

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for DuneCrawl, an open-world action-adventure game developed by Alientrap. Players will take command of a gigantic crustacean armed to the teeth and ready to roam the vast lands. Assemble a crew to engage in combat, explore diverse areas, and brave the dangerous lands of DuneCrawl, available now for PC (Steam).

#DuneCrawl #Gaming #IGN
title: DuneCrawl - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Pac-Man Pack Teaser Trailer for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, the hit arcade racing game developed by SEGA. Players can get a glimpse at the upcoming DLC pack centered on the iconic Pac-Man IP. 

The Pac-Man Pack is launching on January 7 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #SonicRacingCrossWorlds #PacMan
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official Pac-Man Pack Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Flame Rifle Trailer for Hunt: Showdown 1896, a first-person extraction multiplayer shooter developed by Crytek. Players can wield the Flame Rifle with Bradley the Brutal, who's modified a medium slot rifle to produce a relentless burst of fire. 

Char the opposition with the Flame Rifle in Hunt: Showdown 1896, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #HuntShowdown #FPS
title: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Official Flame Rifle Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Winter Wipeout Event Trailer for Apex Legends, the hit first-person battle royale shooter developed by Respawn Entertainment. 

Players can take on enemies in ice-cold style with the new Hoverboards to pull off tricks, ride walls, and defeat enemies. 

The Winter Wipeout Event kicks off on January 6 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and EA).

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Gameplay Walkthrough Trailer for Code Vein 2, an upcoming souls-like action RPG developed by Bandai Namco Studios. 

Players can get an extensive look at the gameplay of Code Vein 2, showcasing weapons, dungeons, and bosses in the epic adventure across a post-apocalyptic world. 

Code Vein 2 is launching on January 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #CodeVein2 #Soulslike
title: Code Vein 2 - Official Gameplay Walkthrough Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Styx: Blades of Greed, an upcoming third-person stealth action-adventure game developed by Cyanide Studio. 

Players can check out over 10 minutes of gameplay, fitted with stealth mechanics, abilities, and more in the next chapter of Styx's story. Styx: Blades of Greed is launching on February 19 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #StyxBladesOfGreed #Stealth
title: Styx: Blades of Greed - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Trailer for FPS Quest, a first-person action boomer shooter developed by Farlight Games Industry. Players will fight through waves of enemies with one critical caveat: the frames-per-second of the game itself is dependent on your health. Change settings on the fly, unlock new scripts, and take on the Dungeon Lord in FPS Quest, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#FPSQuest #Gaming #IGN
title: FPS Quest - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 4: Airport Hunt Update Overview for Arena Breakout: Infinite, a first-person free-to-play multiplayer extraction shooter developed by Morefun Studios. 

Players can get details on the upcoming update for the game, packed with the new Guoyapos Airport map, new weapons, quality-of-life updates, and more. 

The Season 4: Airport Hunt Update for Arena Breakout: Infinite is launching on January 8 for PC.

#IGN #ArenaBreakoutInfinite #FPS

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer 3 for Greenland 2: Migration, an action thriller distributed by STX Entertainment, Thunder Road Pictures, and Lionsgate. Embark on a journey with Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis as Earth hangs in the balance after an apocalyptic event ravages the planet. Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on January 9, 2026.

In the aftermath of a comet strike that decimated most of the Earth, Greenland 2: Migration follows the Garrity family (Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, and Roman Griffin Davis) as they’re forced to leave the safety of their bunker in Greenland to traverse a shattered world in search of a new home.

Greenland 2: Migration stars Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, Roman Griffin Davis, Amber Rose Revah, Sophie Thompson, Trond Fausa Aurvåg, William Abadie, and more. The film is written by Chris Sparling and Mitchell LaFortune, alongside the film being directed by Ric Roman Waugh.

Greenland 2: Migration is in theaters on Janu
title: Greenland 2: Migration - Official Trailer 3 (2026) Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Story Teaser Trailer for The Blood of Dawnwalker, an upcoming open-world dark fantasy action RPG developed by Rebel Wolves. Players can get a tease of the game's narrative surrounding Coen, a man by day and a vampire by night, in the ultimate fight to save their family. The Blood of Dawnwalker is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#TheBloodOfDawnwalker #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
With improved combat, a refinement of existing systems, and and a couple of brand new twists, Code Vein 2 is shaping up to be a promising sequel that iterates upon its already promising core. Here's our thoughts in our final preview of Code Vein 2 before its January 30 release date.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Code Vein 2 - The Final Preview

author: IGN
description:
Rebel Wolves celebrates the past year for The Blood of Dawnwalker, whilst looking ahead at 2026! 
Check out their recap of 2025, from CG trailer to gameplay showcase, followed by a thank you from the team at Rebel Wolves, the reveal of the main theme of The Blood of Dawnwalker and finally a tease of things to come! 

The Blood of Dawnwalker releases in 2026 for PC (Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #TheBloodOfDawnwalker #ActionRPG
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker - Official Launch Year Celebration Trailer
